alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 9:38PM CDT until June 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEWELL...SOUTHEASTERN CLAY...NUCKOLLS...EAST CENTRAL WEBSTER...FILLMORE AND THAYER COUNTIES... At 936 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Geneva to near Ruskin to near Bostwick, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. The main threat for large hail will affect notheastern Nuckolls County during the next 15 minutes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Also, at 931 PM CDT, a 59 MPH gust was measured by a mesonet just north of Nelson. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Shickley and Ruskin around 940 PM CDT. Geneva around 945 PM CDT. Deshler, Strang and Lovewell State Park around 950 PM CDT. Hebron and Hardy around 955 PM CDT. Milligan and Ohiowa around 1000 PM CDT. Gilead around 1010 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
